name: Ultimate Backgammon: Dice Game
description:
Join the best Backgammon game in the world! It's easy to pick up, but impossible to put down.

Special Features:
– Unlock All 16 Boards – Level up to unlock new boards.
– Earn Premium Dice – Every board features deluxe dice unlocked by playing. No purchase required!
– Become Lord of the Board – Your opponent's skill & intelligence adapts to your playing level.
– Detailed Statistics – Never forget your accomplishments.
